nodes.text: The Concord Dawn system was a star system within the Mandalore sector of the Outer Rim Territories under the control of a Mandalorian squad known as the Mandalorian Protectors. It was home to the planet Concord Dawn, which had at least three moons, the third moon being the location of the Protectors Camp. In 3 BBY,[source?] the rebellion against the Galactic Empire sought safe passage through the system, and were granted such by Fenn Rau, leader of the Protectors.
